an6.118:4.1: “Mendicants, without giving up six things you can’t meditate observing an aspect of the body internally …
an6.118:4.14: Relishing work, talk, sleep, and company, not guarding the sense doors, and eating too much.
an6.118:4.15: After giving up these six qualities you can meditate observing an aspect of principles internally and externally.”
